## WorkspaceSvg.getParentSvg() method

Get the SVG element that contains this workspace. Note: We assume this is only called after the workspace has been injected into the DOM.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getParentSvg(): SVGSVGElement;
```
**Returns:**

SVGSVGElement

SVG element.
